Params: {2: 'Chrome', 3: "This kind of behavior will not help your recovery. Plus, it's not like I have all the time in the world.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But I really want to see it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "If you have so much time on your hands, why don't you go play your games? As soon as the limb repair is done, we'll get started on a new training program.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Besides, I don't think 【kuroname】 will approve of your idea.", 4: '2'}
{2: "I'm here to see Kamui.", 3: '13', 4: "I'm here to see you.", 5: '16'}
{2: "I'm all ears.", 3: '21', 4: 'What are you up to this time?', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ugh, Commandant is heartless! I thought you were here to see me!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'He wanted to go see a play.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You go out on missions every day, while I've been cooped up in here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'How could you leave me to suffer in such boredom—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'As you wish.', 3: '30', 4: "I can't act out a play by myself, can I?", 5: '30'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm bored to death here because of my damn injury!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm down to picking fights and annoying people at this rate...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is here with her little cart-ami!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Nanami waltzes in pushing a cart stacked to twice her height.'}
{2: 'That was impressive.', 3: '39', 4: 'How does she do it with such ease?', 5: '39'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hey, careful! I went to a lot of trouble to make that smoke bomb!', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: '44', 4: 'How did you even get it in here?', 5: '44'}
{2: "What's with the color?", 3: '46', 4: 'Did you make it by hand?', 5: '48'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, these are the... costumes I prepared for the play, but they're not finished yet...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami is outta here with her nana-cart!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The otherwise empty space starts filling up with props and laughter.'}
{2: "He's so full of energy.", 3: '58', 4: "That's the Kamui we know.", 5: '58'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I've been too busy these days to look after my team members...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Never a dull moment with you... and Strike Hawk.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Perhaps I should say... you are a pleasant surprise.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Thank you.', 3: '202', 4: "You're a pleasant surprise for me too.", 5: '202'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "What are you two doing in the corner? We're all set!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Then we'll just read off the script. I'll show you how.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'On the stage, Chrome leans against the prop window, supporting his gloomy face with both hands.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'O Romeo, Romeo! Wherefore art thou Romeo?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "O, be some other name! What's in a name? That which we call a rose; By any other name would smell as sweet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "So Romeo would, were he not Romeo call'd; Retain that dear perfection which he owes...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Or, if thou wilt not, be but sworn my love; And I'll no longer be a Capulet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shall I hear more, or shall I speak at this?', 3: '89'}
{3: '【kuroname】 steps onto the stage from the side.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "What man art thou that thus bescreen'd in night; So stumblest on my counsel?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I know not how to tell thee who I am.', 3: '92'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "My ears have not yet drunk a hundred words; Of that tongue's utterance, yet I know the sound: Art thou not Romeo and a Montague?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Neither, fair saint, if either thee dislike.', 3: '94'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'How camest thou hither, tell me, and wherefore? The orchard walls are high and hard to climb.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'And the place death, considering who thou art; If any of my kinsmen find thee here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What love can do that dares love attempt.', 3: '97'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "By whose direction found'st thou out this place?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Dost thou love me? I know thou wilt say "Ay,"; And I will take thy word: yet if thou swear\'st; Thou mayst prove false;', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'If thou dost love, pronounce it faithfully.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Or if thou think'st I am too quickly won; I'll frown and be perverse and say thee nay; So thou wilt woo; but else, not for the world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'O, swear not by the moon, the inconstant moon; That monthly changes in her circled orb; Lest that thy love prove likewise variable.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I come, anon.—But if thou mean'st not well; I do beseech thee.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'By and by, I come—; To cease thy suit, and leave me to my grief: To-morrow will I send.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Parting is such sweet sorrow... That I shall say good night till it be morrow.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Chrome reaches his hand down toward 【kuroname】 from the window.'}
{3: 'At that moment, pink billowing smoke rises from down the stage, accompanied by the pungent smell of gunpowder and crackles from beneath the stage floor.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "That... wasn't part of the script! B-but it sure spiced up the play, didn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'That was perfect! Commandant, Chrome, that was so slick!', 4: '3'}
{3: 'As Nanami closes the curtains, trumpets on either side of the stage let out deafening blasts. Confetti also fills the stage. Kamui claps his hands in excitement.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'If you ever need me again, just let me know.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'But it does feel good to do this with you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Standing in the fake grass, Chrome looks up toward the window with admiration in his eyes.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'He jests at scars that never felt a wound.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'What light through yonder window breaks? O, it is my love! O, that she knew she were! She speaks yet she says nothing: what of that? Her eye discourses.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Two of the fairest stars in all the heaven; To twinkle in their spheres till they return; What if her eyes were there, they in her head? The brightness of her cheek would shame those stars; As daylight doth a lamp.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'She speaks: O, speak again, bright angel!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Shall I hear more, or shall I speak at this?', 4: '1'}
{2: "What man art thou that thus bescreen'd in night?", 3: '167'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I know not how to tell thee who I am: My name, dear saint, is hateful to myself; Because it is an enemy to thee; Had I it written, I would tear the word.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'How camest thou hither, tell me, and wherefore?', 3: '171'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "With love's light wings did I o'er-perch these walls; For stony limits cannot hold love out; And what love can do that dares love attempt.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'If my kinsmen see thee, they will murder thee.', 3: '173'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Alack, there lies more peril in thine eye; Than twenty of their swords: look thou but sweet; And I am proof against their enmity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I would not for the world they saw thee here.', 3: '175'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'And but thou love me, let them find me here: My life were better ended by their hate; Than death prorogued, wanting of thy love.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'O, wilt thou leave me so unsatisfied? I gave thee mine before thou didst request it. And yet I would it were to give again.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'A thousand times the worse to want thy light.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "It is my soul that calls upon my name: How silver-sweet sound lovers' tongues by night; Like softest music to attending ears!", 4: '1'}
